text: Zisas nen ana nzuaim, mba guigira Zudaiŋ tɨvi vhuuiŋ kaŋgi guma, ana khuen Zisas ga ndɨkndɨgi. Ana kha ndɨkndɨgar nan muuŋ thari, gu ndɨkndɨga vhuuŋ ki fhuvara. Mba guigira Zudaiŋ tɨvi vhuuiŋ kaŋgi guma mba ndɨkndɨgar Zisas ga mbuav, kha nzambaren ana muuŋgi, “Maaŋgi kha kameŋ khaŋ nzuai, nan kɨvntogi? Nan kɨvntogi, mbe theiŋ?”
